entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 06:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
